data.title: Trailer Drops (Along with a Lot of Other Stuff) for Zombie Ass: Toilet of the Dead
data.meta_description: Yes you read that headline correctly.  The film is ZOMBIE ASS: TOILET OF THE DEAD, and this plopping to us from the mind of Noboru Iguchi.  Iguchi is the crazy bastard who brought is such films as THE MACHINE GIRL, ROBOGEISHA, and the very fun MUTANT GIRL'S SQUAD (he was one of three bat-shit crazy…
data.meta_site_name: Horror Movies, Horror News, Horror Reviews | AnythingHorror.com
data.text:
Yes you read that headline correctly. The film is ZOMBIE ASS: TOILET OF THE DEAD, and this plopping to us from the mind of Noboru Iguchi. Iguchi is the crazy bastard who brought is such films as THE MACHINE GIRL, ROBOGEISHA, and the very fun MUTANT GIRL’S SQUAD (he was one of three bat-shit crazy directors). If you’ve seen any of Iguchi’s films then you know he’s certifiably insane but also knows how to make one helluve an over-the-top film full of gore, sexy Japanese girls, more gore, crazy-ass plots, and now apparently, shit. Check out the trailer below … trust me; you don’t need a plot crunch. The trailer “says” it all!!

Thank god the Japanese haven’t invented Smell-O-Vision yet!! ZOMBIE ASS: TOILET OF THE DEAD stars Asami, who stars in all three films listed above as well as HELLDRIVER. She’s a real beaut and I probably shouldn’t be getting turned on thinking about her squatting down and pinching an udon noodle log!! I need therapy.

Stay Bloody!!!
